casebody.data:
STATE of Missouri, Respondent,
v.
Hunter Daine BECHTOL, Appellant. WD 81553 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: July 30, 2019 Karen L. Kramer, Jefferson City, MO, for respondent. Jedd C. Schneider, Columbia, MO, for appellant. Before Division One: Cynthia L. Martin, Presiding Judge, Victor C. Howard, Judge and Alok Ahuja, Judge

ORDER

Per curiam:

Hunter D. Bechtol appeals his conviction following a jury trial on the class D felony of rape in the second degree. Bechtol asserts that the trial court erred in overruling his requests to exclude the victim from the courtroom during trial. Because a formal, published decision would serve no jurisprudential purpose, we affirm Bechtol's conviction by summary order. A memorandum explaining our decision has been provided to the parties. Rule 30.25(b).
